CustomField.formula: IF( AND($User.Salesforce_ID__c <> "0050W000006qj5vQAA",$User.Salesforce_ID__c <> "0050W000006U3JAQA0"), "http://fivestarprofessional.force.com/SelfScheduling/forcebrain__LeadRegistration?ProcessId=a2Z6T000006Df8sUAC&ContactID="+ Contact_SF_ID__c+"&PID="+ Contact__r.Owner.Provider_ID__c +"&OBJ1FID=Opportunity__c&OBJ1Id="&Id, "CEP: https://fivestarprofessional-experience.force.com/s/onlinescheduler?processId=a5F6T0000030K6VUAU&whoId="+ OwnerId +"&clientId="+Id +" "+br()+br()+ "v5: http://fivestarprofessional.force.com/SelfScheduling/forcebrain__LeadRegistration?ProcessId=a2Z6T000006Df8sUAC&ContactID="+ Contact_SF_ID__c+"&PID="+ Contact__r.Owner.Provider_ID__c +"&OBJ1FID=Opportunity__c&OBJ1Id="&Id)
CustomField.label: BDR Follow Up Link
